diffusion

Class AtomicDiffusion

  • java.lang.Object
    • diffusion.AtomicDiffusion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Diffusion, Subject<ObsCaptorAsync>

    public class AtomicDiffusion
extends java.lang.Object
implements Diffusion
    AtomicDiffusion notify all observers that a new value is available once execute method is called. It will wait that observer have successfully received the value before sending the value to the next one. It inherits from Diffusion for the Strategy pattern.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(CaptorOriginator originator)
        execute is called each time CaptorMonitor updates its state. It will notice and wait that observer have successfully received the value before sending the value to the next one.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Diffusion
        Parameters:
        originator - : originator is the reference of captor monitor which has updated its state
